author: billbarker
msg: Getting the tab-police off my case ;-).

author: billbarker
msg: Moving the new protocols logic to the 14 Factory.

This feature isn't supported (at least in the public interface) in JSSE 1.0.x.  Now you can still use SSL with a 1.3.x JVM.  I didn't attempt to dig into the com.sun.** to see if there is a hidden implementation there.

author: remm
msg: - Fix the build. Please do ant clean; ant after modifying any interface
or superclass (or after any big commit). Thanks.

author: luehe
msg: - Added support for specifying comma-separated list of SSL protocol
This may be useful to disable the less secure SSLv2.
- Fixed bug where if none of the requested ciphers were actually supported, no

msg: - Added support for specifying comma-separated list of SSL protocol
